Hey guys. I had an interesting idea yesterday and I'm gonna share it 
with you.

Most new members, when they join, have no idea what factions like the 
Alliance, the Chosen Ones, the Destrons (although more people know 
about the Destrons than the made up factions) are, so they end up 
joining either the Maximals or the Preds. My idea is to make an 
advertising system, to display ads on the bottom of the character, 
member, join, main, and other pages. These ads would be advertising 
the various factions and will be designed by the faction commander. 
The ads would link to a page describing the faction, which would also 
be designed by the faction commander. Then new people can get various 
faction propoganda to persuade them to join factions other than the 
familiar ones.

I'll add a poll to the poll section, so vote on that. If enough people 
want it, I'll pro
